This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Check that block-size < min-block-size or min-block-size < block-size <= max-block-size or block-size > max-block-size in vertical-lr 
PASS Check that width override block-size and vice versa in vertical-lr 
PASS Check that block-size < min-block-size or min-block-size < block-size <= max-block-size or block-size > max-block-size in table vertical-lr 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
